comment: Her class is very easy. she will make it fun, and you have take home test. Do the labs and use the book to take the test at home, you should get an A. I RATE HER 5 OUT OF 5. EXCELLENT TEACHER.
SOOOOO easy!!I made a 97% in her class. Do the labs on the e-text and take the tests and you are good to go. The labs take 5 minutes and the tests are common sense!
Super easy, and nice. Grades on point scale. Plenty of extra credit if you actually needed it. easy test
She is sweet and helpful, and is very passionate about fitness. she works with you and is very extremely easy going.  i recommend

Very easy and laid back teacher. Shes also very nice and understands that students have a personal life. She provides study guides for the tests which are very helpful! She doesn't grade assignments hard either. Bottom line just learn the study guide and do the work and this should be an easy A.
SUPER NICE! Attendance is extra credit! Tests are exactly like the study guide! All powerpoints are emailed to you and the study guide questions are straight from the powerpoints!

SUPER easy! She knows that this class isn't what you want to take. She understands this is required as doesn't pretend that her class is the most important class you're taking. She is very understanding and knows what she is talking about. Wonderful teacher and person in general. TAKE HER! I cannot stress that enough.

Easy A. Most of the stuff is common sense. Easy to bluff your way through the labs and she knows it. She realizes that you're an adult and know this stuff, and that this is just a required class. Eeeeeasy A.
Great professor! Easy A!

TAKE HER!! Best professor at KSU. Attendence only mandatory on days "bolded" on the syllabii. All lab assignments are online so buy the code. This class was a breeze. Powerpoinsts and study guides sent from the professor. No reason not to make an A in this class!

Really kind and helpful. The class was interesting and she did a good job holding our attention and facilitating classroom discussions. She doesn't test on things she didn't cover, and has certain mandatory attendance days. She sent out her notes prior to class, as well as study guides for the test.

She is the best teacher, can't say anymore. Very helpful, makes sure you understand everything. There are 3 tests and the final. There are some days that are mandatory for attendance. Uses the online book to turn in labs, etc.
Easiest A in my life. Don't skip out on classes, pay attention, and put in an hour of studying before the test and anyone should be able to make an A. Take her.

Prof. Richardson is awesome. What she covers in class is what she tests you on. Like others have said, her tests are very basic and very simple. Nothing too complex. She teaches the course in a fun way, and the fact that she has a personality really helps! Class rare goes the full hour 15. She's awesome, I'd def recommend taking her class!

Best teacher in KSU! Wonderful and easy teacher! Her tests are REALLY REALLY easy. One day I study 30 mins before the test and made an 86, without reading the chapter or anything. Her class is common sense & the class makes you think about your choice of lifestyle in a nice way! She try to make class convenient to everyone to attend whatever time.
Great teacher ,very easy course,i made an A in this class take her if you need a GPA boost

Awesome! She is very lively, and lives by her own words.  She is also very nice.  She approaches the material from a pragmatic perspective.  You will in no way be disappointing. She knows how to live life.

Mrs. Richardson is such a sweet, caring lady. She is an elementary PE teacher by day and comes to the college to teach at night. She is very enthusiastic about fitness and health. She wants you to succeed and come away from her class with knowledge to better your life and your health. Easy A if you follow the syllabus. I highly recommend her!

She is a nice professor who doesn't try to make this class difficult. She gives you many opportunities to make a good grade, so if you do the work you'll make an A. Attendance not mandatory which is great!

She truly believes in what she is teaching. Tests are extremely easy, just go over the power points that she emails you. Buy the fitness for living kit. There are some online labs but they take like 5 minutes to complete. She even gives extra credit!
She definitely cares that you learn how to apply what you learn to your everyday life. She makes everything a breeze and does not disappoint!

I am currently enrolled in her class this fall of '11. She is one of the most caring teachers I have yet to have. She will help you in any way possible and is overall concerned in the fact that you learn the information and use it in your real life. Activities are easy and she keeps the classroom interesting.
Awesome lady!
Professor Richardson is a nice lady. She is not there to make class difficult. She really wants her students to be healthy. Study the notes for the exams. All the exams are super easy!
The teacher is outstanding Her lectures are interesting and informative.  You can make an A if you listen in class and take notes.

This is was SUPERRRR EASYY. Took it this summer to get ahead a little and it was soo worth it. She's really easy to talk and really cares about her students. The workload was moderate but easy. All her tests really easy of you do the study guides. TAKE THIS PROF!!!

AMAZING lady. i will probably be friends with her even after i graduate. she really does not care about grades, she just wants college kids to be healthy. she really has your best interest in mind. be nice and go to class! i had a 100 in the class.
Lets you turn in things late if you forget, always answers any questions, and is just so laid back and easy going. Such a great professor. I learned a lot and didn't dread going to class.
She is the greatest! She changed my life as far as diet and exercise go! Take her if you can!!!

She is the best teacher ever. She's not out to fail you but she honestly is out to get you into fitness, which worked for me. She tells you what's expected and as long as you do just that, you will pass with an easy A

WOW!! WOW!!!what can I say...she is the best!!....she gives study guides for the tests..no surprises...go to class...what you learn is important and she makes it fun...I was encouraged to engage in activity and change my diet... this is a req'd course, but you get so much more. This course will change your life...Take her if you can!
Super easy, basic info.  Just do the work, turn it in, and voila!  Extremely flexible on dates, etc.
She is awesome.  attend class and you will be able to pass tests.  my lowest test score was a B but I missed a vital night.  i didn't study for any tests and got A.

An absolute Sweetheart!!! Teaches Elementary school PE, and treats us the same way as she treats them. Extra Credit, flexible with due dates, only takes attendance sometimes. She tries her best to make class fun. Almost always dismisses class early, and cancelled a couple of times. Favorite PE class ever. TAKE HER! There's no one better!
Great teacher she is very helpful and offers extra credit.

awesome teacher! Helps you when you need it, easy study guide for each test, optional final, points days you need to go to and all her tests are from the notes so go to class, but its not a big deal if you miss a day here or there, fun easy class overall! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
SUPER EASY!!! helps you out and makes it very clear what will be on tests. lenient with due dates.
She's wonderful! Really easy class. There are a lot of little assignments but they aren't hard. She offers extra credit, too. Just show up and do the work and you'll get an A.
AWESOME!! Loved her! She's really laid back, not strict on due dates, very knowledgeable and incredibly understanding. Will go out of her way for you. Highly recommended!

She's pretty good. She's really lenient on grades. She basically said we would all get A's on certain things because the website we use was messing up. She tells you exactly what you need to know for tests. Just study the notes, and you should be fine.

You have to take HPS, take it with her.  Classes never go full time.  She gives you days off.  Easy tests.  Very leniant with late work, she will accept it.  You already learned this stuff about 6 times to 12th grade, so you will learn it again.
Great teacher, I would take her again and reccomend her to anyone!!!

EASY!!  Lots of assignments but NOTHING hard at all! Gives points for attendance!  Extremely helpful professor and the information is very valuable! Take notes!!!  Book not mandatory but you will need to copy the lab assignments from someone that has the book or write all the information yourself instead of filling in the blanks. Got an A! EASY!!!!

She was great. Very enthusiastic about fitness and health and she let us do whatever we wanted during work out time. There was a lot of busy work which i didn't like, but as long as you did it you'll get an A. Very nice lady.

This teacher is awesome! Class isn't too difficult. A lot of little assignments and things to do but they don't take much time. A few dress out days when you have class activities and the such. Tests are really really easy. Highly recommended.

Richardson is awesome. I took her night class and didn't mind it at all. If I ever missed a class I'd just check with a classmate and things were fine. Just do the labs and memorize the study guides and you should be fine. Be prepared for the tests to be a little tricky.

WOW. Put Richardson on your schedule as soon as possible for your A in fitness for living. This class reminded me of those ridiculous electives in high school that shouldnt count towards GPA because they are so easy.
Really nice, a fun class. Knows what she's talking about.
Awesome teacher. Very easy and works with your schedule. Tests are easy and she tells you what is exactly on her tests. Very easy. You'll like her.
Great teacher. very easy test. nice lady as well. got an A in class, just do labs and show up for classes when you do labs
